title: The Cure for Instability and Domicide is an Encounter with Jesus by any Means Possible
description:
Christian tv and movies - yuck 🤮 but many exvangelics, “nones” and gen z people are responding in an extremely positive way to @The Chosen - maybe the more sophisiticated among us should consider whats going on there.

PVK - Intentional living 

https://youtu.be/-g2vKtVwBSg

“Them before us” founder on divorce 

https://youtu.be/46v6YGn6OZs

Orthodox priest converts to evangelical Christianity 

https://youtu.be/VUXQiF1MWnQ

The chosen livestream

https://youtu.be/f7_73W0gJuQ
